abstract.text: Submits the specified job to the specified domain.

inlineContent.text: describing the specific error when submitting the job, or
if no error occurred. It’s the responsibility of the app to release the error reference. This argument can be
Returns true if the system successfully submits the job, otherwise

abstract.text: Manage startup items, launch agents, and launch daemons from within an app.
Copies the job description dictionaries for all jobs in the specified domain.
Copies the job description dictionary for the specified job label.
Removes the job with the specified label from the specified domain.
Submits the specified job to the specified domain.
The authorization rights key for modifying system daemons.
A pointer to an opaque authorization reference structure.
A reference to an immutable dictionary object.
A reference to a CFError object.
A reference to a CFString object.
A value type whose instances are either `true` or `false`.
A pointer for accessing and manipulating data of a specific type.
A raw pointer for accessing and manipulating untyped data.
A type for propagating an unmanaged object reference.

inlineContent.text: describing the specific error when submitting the job, or
if no error occurred. It’s the responsibility of the app to release the error reference. This argument can be
Returns true if the system successfully submits the job, otherwise
